allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Jupiter DEX verification and fix GMX V2 integration

This commit adds Jupiter DEX to the verification system and fixes critical issues with the GMX V2 integration.

Backend Changes:
- Add Jupiter verification function to verify-platform-data.ts with Dune API integration
- Increase Jupiter/Dune API timeout from 30s to 120s for slow query execution
- Fix GMX V2 GraphQL query to use ''marketInfos'' instead of deprecated ''markets''
- Fix GMX V2 funding rate fields to use ''feeUsdPerPoolValue'' (actual schema) instead of non-existent fields
- Add asset deduplication in dataFetcher.ts to handle GMX V2''s multiple markets per token
- Improve GMX V2 error handling to return empty arrays instead of throwing errors

Key Fixes:
- GMX V2 Schema Update: Changed query from ''markets'' to ''marketInfos'' to match current subgraph
- GMX V2 Duplicate Prevention: Deduplicate assets by symbol to avoid PostgreSQL constraint violation
- GMX V2 Field Mapping: Use correct CollectedMarketFeesInfo fields (feeUsdPerPoolValue, cumulativeFeeUsdPerPoolValue)
- Jupiter Timeout: Extended Dune query polling from 30 attempts (30s) to 60 attempts (120s)

Testing:
- Jupiter verification tests SOL, ETH, WBTC assets via Dune Analytics
- GMX V2 successfully fetches 109 unique markets from marketInfos
- Asset deduplication prevents "ON CONFLICT DO UPDATE cannot affect row a second time" error

Note: GMX V2 uses borrowing fees (not traditional funding rates), so many markets may show no data

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
